name: CrabbyIsland Catch
description:
Created for MiniJam 50: Islands (72 hour GameJam)

Welcome to Crabby Island! 

Your goal is to catch as many crabs falling from the sky as possible!

You may notice that you are holding a basket in front of you. That is where the crabs must land.
 Every crab you catch scores you a point!

You have 1 Minute to catch them.

Good Luck!!

Controls:

WASD / Con_LStick = Movement
Mouse / Con_RStick = Look Around
Space / Con_A = Jump
P / Con_Back = Pause
ESC / Con_Start = Quit (or use pause menu button)
